question: What are the permisable food in islam. when we go to eat out side when we do not know whether the meet or chicken is halal or not?
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu alikum. what should we do. Likewise is there any food item prohibit as per Islam
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

Shari'ah has emphasised on exercising precaution in Halaal and Haraam. If
any outlet sells Haraam items as well, one should abstain as such an outlet
cannot be trusted.

If the outlet sells only Halaal and is supervised by a trustworthy Muslim,
then one may eat from there.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
